cu.explanation_en: Setting drb_ciphering to an invalid string 'invalid' will cause configuration parsing errors and prevent the CU from starting properly.

du.explanation_en: Setting Asn1_verbosity to an invalid enum 'none_invalid' will cause ASN.1 processing errors and prevent the DU from initializing.
du.explanation_zh: 將 Asn1_verbosity 設定為無效枚舉值 'none_invalid' 會導致 ASN.1 處理錯誤，並阻止 DU 初始化。
